Hi,

currently I am running a crawl with 500 seeds. After some hours the an=
 error occurs repeatedely in the job.log. It occurs that often, so that the=
 job.log gets 500 MB big - so I assume that something is seriously wrong he=
re (see attachted job.log excerpt). 

As I honestly have no idea what is go=
ing on I try to attach my crawler-beans.xml so that someone might get an id=
ea what I am doing wrong or what is going on.

I'd be glad for any suggesti=
ons what I can try to solve that problem. 

Cheers,
Tino
